product_name: Lezyne Mini Drive XL Front Bike Light
long_description: The Lezyne Mini Drive XL Front Bike Light offers a compact, durable aluminum body and a 250-lumen beam to brighten your path during commutes and evening rides. A single high-performance LED emits a 250-lumen beam that runs for 1 hr. on high and 5 hrs. on flashing; recharge after your ride with a Micro USB cable at any computer. Light can be seen from the side to enhance visibility in traffic. A specialized power-saving mode allows quick switching between high lighting and medium lighting. Power Indicator button allows the user to check the power level any time. The Lezyne Mini Drive XL Front Bike Light includes a wall adaptor to recharge at an outlet, Micro USB charging cable and handlebar mounts.
short_description: The Lezyne Mini Drive XL Front Bike Light offers a compact, durable aluminum body and a 250-lumen beam to brighten your path during commutes and evening rides.
